Christ came to our world to teach every man for whom he died how to practice His virtues in his daily life. "I," said Christ, "sanctify Myself that they also may be sanctified through the truth." Christ was exalted above His associates because He loved righteousness and hated iniquity. The Lord Jesus in His life was without sin, doing that which was just and right in all 


                                   -277- 

things. We are to do as He did. Iniquity signifies whatever is crooked, whatever is twisted out of the right line. Oh, how important that we love sound principles, sound doctrine!
